function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var a = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(fjm) from ecif.lcIB_GS_LXSMSHLC_FJ where lcIB_GS_LXSMSHLC_ID=? and fjlx =(select id from ecif.tIB_WDLXPZ where wdlxm = '书面立项说明' and lcbd = 'lcIB_GS_LXSMSHLC')",[O_WORKFLOW.ID]);
a>=1;

<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var a = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(fjm) from ecif.lcIB_GS_LXSMSHLC_FJ where lcIB_GS_LXSMSHLC_ID=? and fjlx =(select id from ecif.tIB_WDLXPZ where wdlxm = '协同统计表' and lcbd = 'lcIB_GS_LXSMSHLC')",[O_WORKFLOW.ID]);
a>=1;
'请按照公司涉军项目管理要求，履行线下审批程序!'
'附件信息中的书面立项说明未上传，请检查！'
'附件信息中的协同统计表未上传，请检查！'

function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var bean = ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.ibb.systemdocking.papers.LinkstecBean");
var result = bean.execute("1006",$Login.User.UserID,"3",O_WORKFLOW.XMMC,"lcIB_GS_LXSMSHLC","","");
var code =result.get('result');
code ==1;
'在底稿系统中完成“项目承揽及立项阶段”底稿上传工作，才能发起立项流程'

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var key;
key=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.LBORGANIZATION WHERE ID =? CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FID START WITH ID = 10016",[$Login.User.OrgID]);
key==0

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
var  cnt = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
cnt==1

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 and id = 10015 start with id = ?  connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
cnt1 == 0

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 and id = 13929 start with id = ?  connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
cnt1 == 0

condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>

cnt1 == 1

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>

cnt1 == 1

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.OS_CURRENTSTEP T,JGCRM.LBWFCURRENTOWNER A WHERE T.ID = A.STEPID AND T.ENTRY_ID = ? AND T.STEP_ID = 24 AND A.OWNER = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID,$Login.User]);
if (s>0){
LB_workAction("lcIB_GS_LXSMSHLC",O_WORKFLOW.ID,25,"");
ABS_flushObjCache('WORKFLOW.TASK')
}

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["call ecif.PRO_IB_SENDWFNOTIFY(?,?,{0},{1},2,{2})",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.InstID","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"},{"expression":"<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>\r\nABS_SQLVALUE(\"select REPLACE(to_char(wmsys.wm_concat(id)),',',';') from tuser where id in (select userid from jgcrm.lbMember where roleid in (select id from jgcrm.lbRole where name like '%法律合规专员%') AND ORGID = 13834) and Status = 1\")","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"},{"expression":"'-书面立项流程质控部文管已审核'","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"}]]

step.name: 质控三部副审审批(出具审批意见)

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var key;
key=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.LBORGANIZATION WHERE ID =? CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FID START WITH ID = 10016",[$Login.User.OrgID]);
key==0

step.name: 质控三部主审(出具审批意见)
投资银行总部总经理审批
并购融资部总经理审批

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.OS_CURRENTSTEP T,JGCRM.LBWFCURRENTOWNER A WHERE T.ID = A.STEPID AND T.ENTRY_ID = ? AND T.STEP_ID = 119 AND A.OWNER = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID,$Login.User]);
if (s>0){
LB_workAction("lcIB_GS_LXSMSHLC",O_WORKFLOW.ID,120,"");
ABS_flushObjCache('WORKFLOW.TASK')
}
